# Data

```{r}
set.seed(87041)
n <- 100
rho <- .8
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- rho * x + rnorm(n, 0, sqrt(1 - rho^2))
dat <- data.frame(x, y)
head(dat)
```

# Plot

```{r}
psych::pairs.panels(dat)
```
